User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user within the YU Playbook platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile photo.

creationTime.description: Timestamp of when the user account was created.

lastSignInTime.description: Timestamp of the user's last sign-in.

role.description: The user's role in the application.

Tournament.title: Tournament
Tournament.description: Represents a tournament within the platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the tournament entity.

teamIds.description: References to Teams participating in the tournament. (Relationship: Tournament 1:N Team)

id.description: Unique identifier for the coaching program entity.

instructorId.description: Reference to User who is the instructor. (Relationship: User 1:N CoachingProgram)

studentIds.description: References to Users enrolled in the program. (Relationship: User N:N CoachingProgram)

Team.title: Team
Team.description: Represents a team participating in tournaments.

id.description: Unique identifier for the team entity.

coachId.description: Reference to User who is the coach of the team. (Relationship: User 1:N Team)

playerIds.description: References to Users who are players in the team. (Relationship: User N:N Team)

Match.title: Match
Match.description: Represents a match within a tournament.

id.description: Unique identifier for the match entity.

tournamentId.description: Reference to Tournament the match belongs to. (Relationship: Tournament 1:N Match)

teamAId.description: Reference to Team A in the match. (Relationship: Team 1:N Match)

teamBId.description: Reference to Team B in the match. (Relationship: Team 1:N Match)

startTime.description: Scheduled start time of the match.

endTime.description: Actual end time of the match.

teamAScore.description: Score of Team A in the match.

teamBScore.description: Score of Team B in the match.

CoachingLog.title: CoachingLog
CoachingLog.description: Represents a coaching log entry for a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the coaching log entry.

userId.description: Reference to User the log belongs to. (Relationship: User 1:N CoachingLog)

coachId.description: Reference to User who created the log (coach). (Relationship: User 1:N CoachingLog)

date.description: Date of the coaching log entry.

JoinRequest.title: JoinRequest
JoinRequest.description: Represents a user's request to join a team.

userId.description: The ID of the user requesting to join.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

photoURL.description: The photo URL of the user.

status.description: The status of the join request.

TournamentHistory.title: TournamentHistory
TournamentHistory.description: Represents a user's participation in a single tournament match.

team.description: Name of the team the user played for.

result.description: Outcome of the match (e.g., Win, Loss, Draw).

record.description: The final score of the match (e.g., 15-12).

Announcement.title: Announcement
Announcement.description: A broadcast message from a coach to their team.

Event.title: Event
Event.description: A scheduled event for a team, such as a practice or game.

firestore.reasoning:
The Firestore structure is designed to ensure Authorization Independence, support required QAPs (Queries are not Filters), and maintain data integrity.

*   **Users Collection:** Stores user profiles. Access is path-based, ensuring only the user can read/write their profile.
*   **Tournaments Collection:** Stores tournament information.  No specific ownership, open access.
*   **Teams Collection:** Stores team data. No specific ownership, open access.
*   **Matches Collection:** Stores match details, nested under tournaments to leverage hierarchical data. No specific ownership, open access.
*   **CoachingPrograms Collection:** Stores coaching programs. Each program has an instructor and students; instructorId is stored within the document. StudentIds are stored in the `studentIds` array. Access control: Only the instructor (identified by instructorId) can modify a program.
*   **CoachingLogs Collection:** Stores coaching logs. Nested under `/users/{userId}` to leverage hierarchical ownership. Only the user and the coach have access.
*   **TournamentHistory Collection**: New collection nested under users to store their match results. Path-based ownership ensures privacy.
*   **Announcements Collection**: New collection nested under teams to store broadcast messages. Only the coach can write, but any authenticated user can read them, which simplifies access for team members and followers.
*   **Events Collection**: New collection nested under teams to store scheduled events. Only the coach can write, but any authenticated user can read them, which simplifies access for team members.
